data.comment: The match has started at RheinEnergieStadion.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 3, Daniel Siebert signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Andrej Kramaric puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 5, Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hoffenheim's Munas Dabbur has run offside.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Hoffenheim in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Daniel Siebert awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 12, Daniel Siebert awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Sebastian Andersson's header is off-target for 1. FC Cologne.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cologne.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Ermin Bicakcic (Hoffenheim) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 16, 1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Hoffenheim pushes forward through Andrej Kramaric, whose finish on goal is saved.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Hoffenheim are coming forward and Pavel Kaderabek gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
Daniel Siebert signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 21, Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Goal! Sebastian Andersson (1. FC Cologne) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Jan Thielmann with an assist there.
In the minute 24, Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 26, Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Cologne.
Hoffenheim are pushing forward but Munas Dabbur's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 27, Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Daniel Siebert awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Sebastiaan Bornauw for 1. FC Cologne has been booked by Daniel Siebert and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Kevin Vogt of Hoffenheim gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
In the minute 37, Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Daniel Siebert awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Daniel Siebert signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 39, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marco Hoger for 1. FC Cologne who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Hoger has recovered and rejoins the match in Cologne.
In the minute 43, Hoffenheim push upfield but Daniel Siebert quickly pulls them for offside.
Hoffenheim's Christoph Baumgartner gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 45, Hoffenheim have been given a penalty...
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
In the minute 45, In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Goal! Andrej Kramaric gives Hoffenheim a 1-2 lead from the penalty spot.
Ermin Bicakcic (Hoffenheim) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
In Cologne 1. FC Cologne drive forward through Sebastian Andersson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kingsley Ehizibue is on a sub for Marco Hoger for 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 47, 1. FC Cologne's Jan Thielmann misses with an attempt on goal.
Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kasim Nuhu is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
1. FC Cologne are pushing forward but Sebastian Andersson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 51, Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Hoffenheim's Kasim Nuhu is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 53, Ellyes Skhiri for 1. FC Cologne gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Daniel Siebert awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
In Cologne, Jan Thielmann of 1. FC Cologne is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 57, Sebastian Andersson (1. FC Cologne) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cologne.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
The away team replace Munas Dabbur with Ihlas Bebou.
In the minute 63, Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 67, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 69, Ondrej Duda is booked for the home team.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne close to the penalty box.
The home team have replaced Jan Thielmann with Salih Ozcan. This is the second substitution made today by Markus Gisdol.
Markus Gisdol (1. FC Cologne) is making a third substitution, with Dominick Drexler replacing Elvis Rexhbecaj.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Hoffenheim.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
